entry.title: First Time on the Second Time Around
entry.summary:
Author: kitnotkat95

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,419Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 52

Summary: Jason had missed out on so much, and sometimes when Dick looked at him that was all he could think about. Every lost little milestone of late adolescence that all had been taken from him. Other times, though, catching Jason stripping off his helmet and shirt heading in for a shower down in the cave post-patrol for example, Dick's thoughts would drift in a different direction. He wondered if maybe there were still certain things Jason had yet to lose. It wasn't an unreasonable question for Dick to ask, just last week he'd let Jason suck a hickey into his neck after he'd crawled into Dick's bed complaining that he couldn't sleep. It hadn't been the first time either, but they'd never gone any further than making out even though Dick had tried to make it clear he'd be more than okay with doing more. All of that to say, there was a non-zero possibility that Jason was still a virgin. For Batship Winter/Dick Week Prompt: Virginity Kink

entry.title: You Are Out of My League
entry.summary:
Author: ivebeenbamboozled (brainwitchletty)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 637,636Chapters: 58/60Kudos: 1,653

Summary: The story begins with a new Robin to replace the old, with Nightwing none the wiser to being replaced at all, and suddenly he has a little brother within the same terrible day. It takes a while to accept, but Dick quickly learns this new Robin-- Jason Todd-- is exactly what Dick Grayson was always missing in his life, and in many more ways than one. Through the years with the team and working with the Justice League, Jason finds a place for himself and becomes a vital member of the Young Justice League while also becoming a vital centerpiece in Dick's life. And when all that ends-- when Jason Todd is taken away from Dick-- it's going to be even harder to put his life back together with that emptiness returning once more. . . . Mostly canon compliant story detailing Jason's introduction to the Young Justice League as Robin, his eventual death, and Dick discovering the mysterious red-hooded figure acting as Ra's Al Ghul's bodyguard is a lot more familiar than he should be.

entry.title: Dick bites. It's a problem.
entry.summary:
Author: VanyKruemelPendragon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 66,750Chapters: 18/28Kudos: 335

Summary: Thanks to batsandbirdbrains (Tumblr) it's now my headcanon that Dick bit as Robin.This is a COLLECTION of oneshots, somewhat related around one thing: Dick bites.Mostly Mature for the biting and violence, though the last chapter is PWP (DickJay). “You bite strange men, you get the rinse,” Batman said. “That’s the rule.” Robin tried to twist away, but Batman levered Robin up onto his feet with one hand, the other aiming the peroxide at Robin’s mouth. Robin clamped his lips tight. Batman’s patience snapped. “Open,” he growled. “Now.”“Mh-mh!” Robin kicked, but Batman hoisted him higher, one hand under Robin’s armpit, the other holding his head in place.“You don’t want hepatitis.” Batman said, voice ticking up a notch.Robin stopped struggling, eyes wide. Batman saw the pause, and loosened his grip - only to make Robin wind out of his grip and start running. The man with the bitten arm moaned.“What the fuck is wrong with you?” he managed, voice thick with pain and shock.Robin deadlooped over him, baring his teeth in a wicked, blood-stained grin.“Don’t grab the Robin,” he said. “That’s the first lesson.” Fully written fic, upload every Wednesday and Sunday!

entry.title: My little Robin
entry.summary:
Author: VanyKruemelPendragon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 159,548Chapters: 38/56Kudos: 262

Summary: After Robin got kidnapped, ages ago, for the ploy of a love sick Talia, for proposing to Bruce in their twisted way, she'd come to Dick, desperate, alone, pretending to be broken.Dick, just fired as Robin, with a replacement lined up, doesn't believe one word she says, until she starts being honest. Until he sees a way to handle his hurt feelings.Three years later, she's back. Not broken, not quite as desperate, and yet honest, again. Honest how she's afraid of her position as heir to the League, with an actual male heir around. Honest about her wish to get rid of said heir.Dick has no choice, not really. He has to take Damian in. It's his son, after all. Fic is fully written and will be uploaded chapter by chapter. Upload every Wednesday and Sunday. Which means this will be done... December 31st, if I do daily uploads in the Christmas weeks. It'll allow you to read the last chapter, which is set shortly after midnight, on New Year's Day, after midnight ;)

entry.title: The Dynamic Duo
entry.summary:
Author: sarriathmg

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,777Chapters: 3/30Kudos: 130

Summary: Having been Batman for four years, Dick Grayson still hasn't gotten used to the heaviness of the cowl. Now, investigating a mass disappearance case that happened a few days ago in a late-night diner, Dick meets a young street rat who's had friends tangled up in the same web. Jason Todd has all the traits Dick saw in himself when he first started—curious, shrewd, agile, and, most importantly, wanting to do good. Despite Dick's initial rejection of the boy, he starts to think that a long-term partnership isn't a bad idea. Perhaps four years have been long enough time for the current stasis. Perhaps, he thinks, it's time for his own Robin.

entry.title: blown smoke
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,896Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 27

Summary: [After the fiasco that was the last Wayne Enterprises gala he had been a server at—Joker crashing the party, chaos everywhere, glass flying, coupled with the faint but persistent terror that for some reason Bruce Wayne’s social calendar always attracted homicidal clowns—Harper had sworn off working for WE events for life. He’d left with a cracked shoulder, a minor concussion, and the lingering sense that Gotham’s rich were somehow exempt from natural consequences as he herded untouched panicked socialites to safety as Gotham’s own Robin swung down from the rafters in pursuit of the purple clad madman. Never again.  But money was tight. And Ruddy had hit him up.  And “tight” was an understatement this month.]  or, Harper needs the cash. Badly. Ruddy’s offering the standard Wayne Enterprises gala rate—obscenely high for a night of ferrying champagne to people who think “labor” is a French word—So he takes the shift. Of course he takes the shift. He just…also happens to end up in the wrong place at the wrong time (again) and walks straight into something he absolutely should not have seen.
